about_the_game:
The complete original soundtrack for The Incredible Baron, composed by Esselfortium. Songs will appear as high quality MP3s in the The Incredible Baron folder on your computer (steamapps\common\The Incredible Baron\Esselfortium - The Incredible Baron Soundtrack).

Includes 24 tracks:
1. The Incredible Baron - Main Theme 01:39
2. Science Awaits! 02:05
3. Panflute Paradigma 02:06
4. Frozen Lake 01:51
5. Lost Woods 02:06
6. Moai Time 02:02
7. Nora Appears 01:08
8. In Search of Shade 01:50
9. Baron's Love Letter 00:50
10. Smartlee's Workshop 01:04
11. Powder Day 02:02
12. All's Fair in Lava 'nd War 03:05
13. Baron Defeated 00:07
14. Baron Victorious 00:04
15. Tranquil Village 02:12
16. Stowaway 02:28
17. Midnight Voyage 02:07
18. Smartlee's Theme 00:53
19. Pulling the Strings 00:53
20. Hard Boiled Cave 03:15
21. Norab's Theme 02:11
22. The Power of Science! 02:43
23. Baron's Theme 01:06
24. Infinite Peril 03:45
